Package layout_algorithm

Class Summary
CenterGraph relocate nodes to the center of the canvas drawing area does not change relative positioning between nodes
CircleLayout please refer to the article, "crossing reduction in circular layouts*", edited by M.
CircleLayoutWithNoAlg run circle layout without algorithm
GridLayout change graph layout to a rectangular grid fashion
HierarchicalLayout2 change graph layout according to Sugiyama's 4 step algorithm crossing reduction implemented using global sifting crossing reduction
ModifyStateLoop to put the sign of state loop in a space where less edges pass
SpringLayout change graph layout according to spring algorithm
